Add a record to HDF5 file of well inputs and outputs

Add a record to HDF5 file of well inputs and outputs

get.well.slot(hFile, fieldName, wellName, verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

hFile

HDF5 file, full path
fieldName

the field name
wellName

the well name
verbose

FALSE to prevent printing messages

Value

a string with /field/well/datetime if creation successful otherwise, NULL

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
